S

saveGame() - Method in class controller.ChessController
This method will enable users to save a game that can later be re-loaded and played.
saveGame() - Method in class model.ChessModel
This method will save a game so that it can be accessed later.
secondMove - Variable in class model.ChessMoveMessage
 
secondMoveCoordinateKey() - Method in class model.ChessMoveMessage
A method to swap and access the x, y coordinates of the second move.
setWhiteTurn(boolean) - Method in class controller.ChessController
This method will set the whiteTurn boolean value in the model to the boolean that is passed as a parameter.
setWhiteTurn(boolean) - Method in class model.ChessModel
This method will set the white player's turn status to true/false.
start(Stage) - Method in class view.ChessGUIView
This method is required as a result of the class extending Application.
startClient() - Method in class controller.ChessController
This method will start the client so the users can play on a network.
startServer() - Method in class controller.ChessController
This method will start the server so the users can play on a network.
